Haste
At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you've sacrificed a permanent this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.
{T}, Sacrifice this creature: It deals damage equal to its power to any target. Activate only as a sorcery.
flavor_text: [i]In hindsight, certifying just anyone for processing living oldsteel had been... unwise.[/i]
